name: Shun big and Shun small, Blue Archive, multi form LoRA
description:
Shun:

This lora is capable of producing both versions of Sunohara Shun, from Blue Archive.

There is some tag overlap, so make sure to include the "activation token" so that the outfit steers in the right direction.

There are some tags that are common to both forms, tags for each and the common tags will be below.

The halo is inconsistent, but it generally gets the shape correct. It pretty much can't get the smaller details in the halo correct, but that is more or less a dataset issue.

Shun big has some bleed of the dress, but can generally be resolved if you use the tag halter dress instead of black dress.

Generally, the details will be consistent enough that you can get a good gen every 2 or 3 gens. All examples in this are gens from trying only a few times to get a somewhat decent halo.

The dataset was a bit annoying to work with on this one, as the artists didn't play nice with the halo, and the little bead thing that Shun big has.

I do think I want to try and train this again with a slightly more up to date dataset, as well as a higher resolution, because I think that is the biggest reason why the halo doesn't have all of the correct details.

not all of these tags are strictly required, but you will have to use most of them.

common tags:

black hair, long hair, bangs, tiger ears, tiger girl, halo, green eyes

tags to activate shun:

shun \(blue archive\), ponytail, large breasts, halter dress, chinese clothes, hair ornament, bridal gauntlets

tags to activate shun small

shun \(small\) \(blue archive\), twintails, flat chest, black dress, china dress, short sleeves, white thighhighs, hair ribbon

Please do not use this LoRA for anything unsavory, as that was not the intended purpose

meta.(halo: 1.0), animal ear fluff, upper body, tiger ears, tiger girl
meta.prompt: (shun \(blue archive\):1.2), 1girl, solo, black hair, long hair, looking at viewer, large breasts, halter dress, (chinese clothes:1.0), ponytail, bangs, blush, (halo:1.0), animal ear fluff, upper body, tiger ears, tiger girl, building, refinery <lora:shun:1>,
